summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1924, for the improvement of East Howell Street, form 24th Avenue to 32nd Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and constructing wooden curbs and gutters and all necessary drains and adjusting all manholes and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 19842 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
